QuestData.Title: Return to the Abyssal Shelf
QuestData.Description: $n, you've proven yourself as a capable gryphon rider, and we could use you on more sorties over the Abyssal Shelf. What say you, $c? Do you want some more flight time?
QuestData.LogDescription: Gryphoneer Windbellow at Shatter Point in Hellfire Peninsula has asked that you destroy 20 Gan'arg Peons, 5 Mo'arg Overseers and 5 Fel Cannons.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are still plenty of targets on the Abyssal Shelf, $n. Grab a gryphon when you're ready for another run.
QuestData.RewardText: How'd it go out there this time? You're in pretty good shape... maybe even good enough for another run!
